meaningMnemonic: We want you to say things with your <radical>mouth</radical> right <radical>now</radical> because it's <kanji>recital</kanji> time! Go, perform please. What do you mean you didn't know the recital was right now? Well, tough luck. Recite!
readingMnemonic: Here, if you are too afraid to start the <kanji>recital</kanji> now drink this <reading>gin</reading> (ぎん) to get your courage up. But once you're done drinking it the recital starts!
